ValidationRule.description: Reason is mandatory when Joining another university OR Other is selected.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c , "B4"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c , "B4-") ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status_Change_Reason__c, "Joining another university"), ISPICKVAL(Status_Change_Reason__c, "Other") ), ISBLANK(Reason__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide details for the selected reason.
